mapper.sql: id, aid, pid, bxid, count, price, total, opstatus, status
mapper.select: select t.*, pr.id as prid,pr.name as prname,pr.code as prcode,pr.specification as prspecification,pr.unit as prunit,pr.kg as prkg,pr.piececount as prpiececount, u.id as uid,u.name as uname from sample_ap_item t left outer join productboxinfo pr on t.bxid=pr.id left outer join unit u on pr.gu = u.id where t.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t.status=0

select t.*, pr.id as prid,pr.name as prname,pr.code as prcode,pr.specification as prspecification,pr.unit as prunit,pr.kg as prkg,pr.piececount as prpiececount, u.id as uid,u.name as uname from sample_ap_item t left outer join productboxinfo pr on t.bxid=pr.id left outer join unit u on pr.gu = u.id where t.aid = #{aid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t.status=0

select t.*, pr.id as prid,pr.name as prname,pr.code as prcode,pr.specification as prspecification,pr.unit as prunit,pr.kg as prkg,pr.piececount as prpiececount, u.id as uid,u.name as uname from sample_ap_item t left outer join productboxinfo pr on t.bxid=pr.id left outer join unit u on pr.gu = u.id where t.pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t.status=0
mapper.insert:

mapper.update:
update sample_ap_item
aid = #{aid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bxid = #{box.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
count = #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER},

total = #{total,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
opstatus = #{opstatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
